sentences.sContent: Street-fighting in Osh, the largest city in southern Kyrgyzstan, between ethnic Kyrgyz and minority Uzbeks escalated rapidly into a pogrom.
sentences.sContent_eng: Street-fighting in Osh, the largest city in southern Kyrgyzstan, between ethnic Kyrgyz and minority Uzbeks escalated rapidly into a pogrom.
sentences.sCn: 在吉尔吉斯斯坦南部第一大城市奥什市，吉尔吉斯族和乌兹别克族的街头冲突迅速升级成为一场大屠杀。

trans.tranCn: (尤指沙俄时对犹太人的) 大屠杀
trans.tranOther: a planned killing of large numbers of people, usually done for reasons of race or religion
